## New Command Checklist

- [ ] Command file created in `commands/` folder
- [ ] Filename matches the slug (e.g., `my-command.md`)
- [ ] All required fields are present (id, name, slug, category, description)
- [ ] `id` and `slug` are unique (not used by existing commands)
- [ ] Category is valid: `code-quality`, `documentation`, `testing`, or `refactoring`
- [ ] Tested the command in Cursor
